alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:58PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Louis and northeastern Carlton Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1058 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cotton, to near Canyon, to near Cloquet, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Proctor and Pike Lake Near Duluth around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hermantown, Island Lake, Boulder Lake, Wolf Lake, City of Rice Lake and French River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
